params.prompt: In a well-lit room, a woman sits on a beige couch against a plain white wall, creating a simple and clean backdrop. She is dressed in a vibrant red blouse, her hair neatly styled with loose strands framing her face, and she wears small, graceful earrings. She begins by raising her right hand and pointing her index finger upwards as she speaks. Lowering her hand, she claps twice, her fingers moving rhythmically. Her hands gesture expressively, emphasizing her words, and she rubs her hands together before opening them wide in a gesture of enthusiasm. She raises both hands, continuing to gesture dynamically as she talks. The camera steadily focuses on her upper body and face, capturing her lively communication and dynamic hand movements. The scene exudes a calm and focused atmosphere, with a clean and simple style.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
